title: Interaction of anionic Fe3O4 nanoparticles with lipid vesicles: a review on deformation and poration under various conditions
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,25986-26001
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05686H, Review Article
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Mohammad Abu Sayem Karal, Md. Masum Billah, Tawfika Nasrin, Md. Moniruzzaman
The deformation and poration of cell-mimetic giant unilamellar vesicles induced by anionic magnetite (Fe3O4) nanoparticles under various conditions have been discussed. This could lead to potential applications in the field of biomedical research.
